channel.title: Roger Waters The Wall Tour 2010
channel.description:
I went to go see it last night here at St Pete Times Forums(For Florida people, Others mite know it as Tampa Bay Lightning stadium).
First off the concert was fun, All the lights, sounds, effects, and prop's, Made it truly amazing, The opening was awesome as well he really got the people ready for the rest of the show(http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ksDNSa_UbMM The opening), He went from the little wall you see at the opening to a huge wall at the end(http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nf6qqtULk1c) I really have no real words for saying how awesome the concert was. He even had some kids from a school for performers come up with him to help with one of the songs(http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MOt9hUcv7lk).
All I can say is watch the videos of the concert.
P.S. For Casey yes I did feel big and special being in the city from the crap hole Holiday, I EVEN GOT TO USE TOWELS INSTEAD OF PAPER TOWELS OMFG?@!

item.title: Roger Waters The Wall Tour 2010

@krackkid wrote:

Well you could of been there until it started at least

But yeah totally different types of music.

item.title: Roger Waters The Wall Tour 2010
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

krackkid:

Also I ain’t sad I was just out of place, I am to red neck for the city, I should of had Casey come and keep me company.

ahaha, sorry that’s not really my type of music, it’s more along the lines of THIS(The Ritz)

Anyways, I’m still waiting for my date with Silabsoft, so many years turned down now

Also I ain’t sad I was just out of place, I am to red neck for the city, I should of had Casey come and keep me company.
